name: HPWizardSpellBook
0:
”'Alexa, Open Spell Book and tell me a spell'”
”'Tell me a spell from the Spell Book”
”'Search Spell Book for a spell'”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spell book
des: A simple app that will give the user a spell straight out of there very own spell book, along with a description of what the spell does.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
